group_1.narration: Hanna...
She was my most precious friend.
But then...she shattered her own Soul Gem.
Surely...probably, it was for my sake.
I know what Hanna wanted to leave for me,@and what she tried to do for me.
But even so...@I wanted to meet her again.
If I'm going to live like a dead person buried in memories,@I thought I should give it my all.
So I revived Hanna.
I took over Nemu Hiiragi's body, created [textBlue:Rumors],@and summoned her here.
But Iroha Tamaki called Hanna@a "copy born from the Record,"@and Nemu Hiiragi tried to erase her!
It's really awful...@Hanna is still Hanna!
...So I locked them in a place they couldn't get out of@and we ran away.
―Mikoto―@Hanna, which town should we go to next?
I took Hanna with me and continued our escape...@to a world with no one else, where nobody can find us.
Even so, Iroha Tamaki and the others won't stay quiet...@Their friends will surely notice something's wrong@and come up with something.
Also, our supply of magic is cut off.@As we've become Uwasa, we need magic constantly.@So the end of our supply means our end is close...
Maybe our escape will end around Christmas...@but that's okay if I can be with Hanna until then...
Let's have our end with a beautiful Christmas, Hanna.
―Hanna―@I don't care much... Anywhere is fine.
―Mikoto―@Oh, really...?
―Mikoto―@D-did you get tired of running away?@Is it not fun?
―Hanna―@It's not that...
―Hanna―@Anywhere is fine if I'm with you, Sena.
―Hanna―@...S-Sena...@How about you?
―Mikoto―@*Giggle*
―Mikoto―@Anywhere is fine if I'm with you, Hanna.
―Mikoto―@I don't need anything else...
Ah... If only this world would collapse right now@and make us eternal...
The passing time, the air surrounding us,@even the outlines of our bodies,@they all seem unnecessary...impure to us.
I don't need any of it...@as long as it's just the two of us.
But...@I want to leave these memories somewhere...
―Hanna―@Sena, let's plant some seeds.
―Mikoto―@Ah, yes, good idea.
Somewhere along the way,@we started planting flower seeds like this...?@I don't remember well...I've been forgetful lately.
Anyway, by the time Christmas passes and winter ends,@these planted seeds will bloom into beautiful flowers@as proof of our existence...
I'll keep these memories here.@Even if I forget them, their beautiful blossoming@will be rewarding.
When I thought about that, what flashed in my mind was@that apartment complex where I lived with my family.
Why?@That man who didn't act as a father@and the mother who abandoned me@are unpleasant memories.
Why do I remember such memories@and not forget them...?
No matter what, I can't attain ordinary happiness.@That's all I realize.

group_1.textRight: Shall we find a place to sleep tonight here?

group_1.narration: We randomly stopped by a town with@an apartment complex.@It looked very similar to the one I lived in.
Apartment complexes are all the same,@so it's not strange. And since it's such@an abominable place to begin with,@it's almost as if there's no need to be worried about it...
But I couldn't take my eyes off this one.

group_1.textRight: Let's take a room with suggestion magic
and live there for a while!

group_1.narration: For a while...?

group_1.textRight: You haven't had time to settle down@since coming here, right?
So, well...let's take a little break.

group_1.narration: But...if we stay for too long,@it might raise suspicions...

group_1.textRight: Lately, you've been absent-minded too...@Let's rest for now.

group_1.narration: Certainly, I'm wearing myself out unnecessarily.@I should probably get some rest around here,@considering what's ahead.
I've been spending Christmas all alone@without any good memories...@This year, I'd like to make it a good one.
